content:
I'm getting a bunch of new errors like these that prevent the autobuild from publishing...

us-core-comparisons/index.html  error   The html source does not contain the publish box <!--ReleaseHeader--><p id="publish-box">Publish Box goes here</p><!--EndReleaseHeader--> (see note at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Implementation_Guide_Publishing_Requirements#HL7_HTML_Standards_considerations)
us-core-comparisons/template-comparison-CodeSystem.html error   The html source does not contain the publish box
us-core-comparisons/template-comparison-Profile.html    error   The html source does not contain the publish box
us-core-comparisons/template-comparison-ValueSet.html   error   The html source does not contain the publish box
us-core-comparisons/template-comparison-index.html  error   The html source does not contain the publish box
us-core-comparisons/template-comparison-set.html    error   The html source does not contain the publish box
us-core-comparisons/template-comparison.html    error   The html source does not contain the publish box
What are the template-comparison files? Just built sample-ig and SDC with the current template and they seem ok
oh. hang on, you shouldn't see them
they should be exempt from any checking
yes I got them locally and the autobuild complains that there is no publish box and won't publish.
